channel.title: brew on Some Title
channel.description: Recent content in brew on Some Title

item.title: After changing the account name on Mac, I could not use pip or ipython, so I re-installed python and it was cured
item.description: #Overview When I changed my mac account name, I couldn’t use pip or ipython installed by pyenv, so I could use python again. #environment macOS Catalina 10.15.4 Homebrew 2.2.11 pyenv 1.2.17 python 3.8.0 #Background I used brew on mac to install pyenv, and then pyenv was used to install python. After that, I changed my mac account name (and home directory name) for various reasons. Follow the official description to change the account name.
